message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a discount, and I believe it represents a fantastic value for the investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
